description:
11.159 maskedthreshold
Pick pixels comparing absolute difference of two video streams with fixed
threshold.

If absolute difference between pixel component of first and second video
stream is equal or lower than user supplied threshold than pixel component
from first video stream is picked, otherwise pixel component from second
video stream is picked.

This filter accepts the following options:
name: maskedthreshold

options.description: Set threshold used when picking pixels from absolute difference from two input video streams.
options.name: threshold

options.description: Set which planes will be processed as bitmap, unprocessed planes will be copied from second stream. By default value 0xf, all planes will be processed.
options.name: planes

options.description: Set mode of filter operation. Can be abs or diff. Default is abs.
options.name: mode
